summary: a small mod that adds a few more followers to the world along with 2 weapons
descriptionHtml: This is a mod i made for me and a few buddies that adds 12 new followers to skyrim and 2 new weapons, one just being a 2 handed katana that you can enchant, the other one being pretty unique. each follower has a book on them that hints where to find another one. may have future updates and ofcourse i will fix any bugs that are found :D I made all of them eligible for marriage although i havent tested it.
author: LiLKing
